channel.title: GameSpot
channel.description: GameSpot's Everything Feed! All the latest from GameSpot

item.description: Things aren't looking so good for augmented people in the latest trailer for Deus Ex: Mankind Divided.

item.title: Is Ramsay Going to Kill Roose Bolton Next? - GameSpot of Thrones
item.description: The GameSpot of Thrones crew are convinced that they've identified Ramsay's next victim - and signs are pointing at Roose. Is their logic solid? Judge for yourself in this week's GameSpot of Thrones! Beware show spoilers and speculation!

item.title: Captain America: Civil War Spoiler-Free Review
item.description: Team Cap or Team Iron Man? Lucy James gives Tamoor an in-depth spoiler-free review of Marvel's much anticipated Captain America: Civil War and answers your questions.

item.title: The Walking Dead: Michonne - Episode 3: What We Deserve Review
item.description: What We Deserve feels personal, a narrative so steeped in familial heartbreak that it almost plays more like a visual stream-of-consciousness diary than a choose-your-own-adventure zombie apocalypse story. What started as a typical tale about how to survive the zombie apocalypse shifts in its fin

item.description: Despite the course being essentially just a slab of asphalt, we have what may be our best race yet!

item.title: Quick Look: 8-Bit Armies
item.description: Dan and Drew command cute blocky tanks and conquer other cute blocky tanks.

item.title: Live From Vinny's Basement: Fallout 4
item.description: Maybe it's time to do some falling back in with Fallout 4.

item.title: Alt+F1: 78 - Russian GP Prerace 2016
item.description: Despite racing next to a sea as black as Bernie's heart, teams are optimistic about new wings, new engines, new hires, and the potential for Roborace robots to immediately develop a taste for human flesh.

item.title: Giant Bomb Presents: Introducing Nick Capozzoli
item.description: Austin chats with new guest contributor Nick Capozzoli about mobile strategy game Subterfuge, how architecture influences his writing, and the state of games criticism.

item.title: Guest Column: The Known Unknowns of Subterfuge
item.description: “I’ve done business, politics, and war. Now I’m trying my hand

item.title: Unfinished: Bunker Punks 04/20/2016
item.description: Bunker ain't no religious cult. Bunker means thinkin' for yourself.

item.title: Nintendo Earnings Report Sets March 2017 Release Date For NX
Giant Bombcast 04/26/2016
item.description: The gang's all back from PAX and unnervingly battered and bruised, but even wrestling injuries can't stand in the way of talk about the best of the show, Housemarque's latest, the end of the Xbox 360, the uncertain whereabouts of Frog Fractions 2, and, um, another generation of Monster Hunter.

item.title: Quick Look: LOUD on Planet X
item.description: We're not exactly sure what the story is for why these musicians are fighting aliens... so join us as we invent one!

item.title: Quick Look: Epistory - Typing Chronicles
item.description: The typing was going so well until I had to try and distinguish colors. Good thing I've got some friends to help!

item.title: The Community Spotlight - 04/23/2016
item.description:
Many thanks to graboids for the banner this week!

It's another edition of @zombiepie's Community Showcase! Thanks as always to him for co

item.title: The Giant Beastcast - Episode 48
item.description: It's time to chat about that PlayStation 4 news, which means a lot of Matrix talk. We also talk about Ken Levine's new gig, that big Kerbal update, GameStop's GameTrust, and more.

item.title: Alt+F1: 77 - Chinese GP 2016
item.description: Under a haze of smog and painkillers, we recount the latest steamy episode of the F1 soap opera, including titillating Turn 1 carnage, risqué stratz, dirty kart gossip, and only the HOTTEST of Indonesian exchange rate news.

item.description:
